text:
Hi,

I'm using Tomcat 4 and i have a bug with jsp:plugin.
The code that the tag generates does 
not quote any value passed in a
<jsp:param> tag in the <EMBED> part of the generated code.
The 
parameters are correctly quoted in the <OBJECT> part of the
generated code. So my applet 
doesn't work well under netscape.

I saw that this bug was already reported as bug #554 but for 
Tomcat 3.2
so i'm suprised to still have the problem.

Is there already a 
solution????

Thx in advanced
creator: olivier.billiard@idatys.thalesgroup.com
kin-man.chung@sun.com
text: Fixed in 4.0.3 and the nightly build.  Thanks Olivier Billiard for the patch.
